title: Digital Ecosystem
desc: Interactive predator-prey ecosystem simulation with autonomous agents that evolve, reproduce, and form emergent behaviors. Features neural decision-making, energy systems, and real-time interaction.

title: Neural Constellation
desc: Emergent particle simulation with flocking behavior, neural connections, and four interactive modes. Features spatial hashing, Simplex noise drift, and dynamic force fields.

title: First Light
desc: A particle simulation with collision and gravity. First project in Earl's Workshop.

title: Lenia
desc: Continuous cellular automaton generating organic, life-like patterns through convolution-based growth dynamics. Features multiple species presets, interactive seeding, and emergent self-organizing behaviors.
